text: Aur jab insey kaha jaata hai ke Allah ne jo rizq tumhein ata kiya hai usmein se kuch Allah ki raah mein bhi kharch karo to yeh log jinhon ne kufr kiya hai iman laney walon ko jawab dete hain “ kya hum unko khilayein jinhein agar Allah chahta to khud khila deta? Tum to bilkul hi behak gaye ho”
